entry.title: CCC Sour Mini Cherry Bombs - 5.5lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canada Candy Co.
Type: Bulk
Price: 24.99

Bulk Candy for Candy Bars

Canada Candy Co. makes crave-worthy candies and treats for all to enjoy. These cherry bombs are a yummy gummy candy bursting with delicious fruity flavours. These red candies would be a sweet addition to a red-themed event or any sweet celebration, or just for snacking.

  • Peanut Free
  • Kosher
  • Halal
  • Made in Canada

bulk bag - 5.5lbs

Fresh Candy Shipped Fast Across Canada and the USA!

Ingredients

Corn syrup, sugar, water, modified corn starch, citric acid, natural and artificial flavour, malic acid, soybean oil, artificial colours (brilliant blue FCF , tartrazine), fumaric acid, sodium hydrogen malate.

entry.title: CCC Assorted Fish - 2.5 kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canada Candy Co.
Type: Bulk
Price: 18.99

This Catch is Sure to Be Sweet!

    Take a dive in this flavourful ocean full of tasty, colourful, fruity fish! The stunning colours and sweet flavours will have you on a maritime adventure you won't forget. Made by Canada Candy Co., you know that you'll be tasting only the best Canadian made candy!

    This bulk bag provides the perfect amount to share with plenty of friends and family, or to put out at any party - especially one that's sea-themed!
